title: Chris Froome Hints at Racing past Age 40: ‘What I’m Doing Is for Myself, Nobody Else’
content:
Froome asserts he'll keep racing until at least 2025, insists there's no beef with Israel-Premier Tech team owner Sylvan Adams.

Read the full article at Chris Froome Hints at Racing past Age 40: ‘What I’m Doing Is for Myself, Nobody Else’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
